attributes.action: Make friday a day off all muslim students can take part in jummah prayers
attributes.additional_details: Friday is jummah prayer and lots of Muslims allover the uk miss out on this every week so having Friday off will allow them to do this
attributes.background: Make Friday a day off so that students can take part in jummah prayer

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

To make Friday one less day of school, to allow kids to reset for monday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630596

Require schools to have half days on Fridays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628192
